EXPERIENCE

Data Analyst Virtual Internship

Accenture

Mar 2023 - Apr 2023

  • An online program offered by Accenture through Forage, delivering real-time industry-level experience to Data Science Professionals.
  • Contributed to a Social Media Trending Content Analysis project, performing data analysis and preparation for future work.
  • Developed interactive visualizations and comprehensive reports using Tableau, resulting in enhanced data insights and streamlined decision making processes

Data Analyst

IBM

Dec 2022 - Feb 2023

  • An internship offered by IBM through Edunet Foundations in collaboration with AICTE
  • Contributed to an AI sign recognition project, specifically focusing on data collection and data analysis phases.
  • Implemented image processing techniques to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of the AI sign recognition system.
